exclusion.criterion: alteration in insulin sensitivity such as major surgery, infection, renal failure
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: recent (within 2 weeks) serious hypoglycemic episode (requires assistance of another)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: simultaneous participating in another clinical study
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has no other underlying disease and is not on any medications. He ate a salad at a restaurant prior to his diarrhea onset.
